archimate:ApplicationService.name: RIS/PACS
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation:
Radiology Information System (RIS)
• Function: Manages radiology workflows, scheduling, reporting
• Relationships:
o Integrates with → EHR: Shares radiology reports with patient records o Integrates with → PACS: For image workflow management o Used by → Radiology Department: Primary users of the system o Runs on → VM Host Cluster: For reliability and performance
Picture Archiving and Communication System (PACS)
• Function: Stores, retrieves, presents, and shares medical images
• Relationships:
o Stores data in → Storage SAN: Requires large storage capacity for images o Integrates with → EHR: Makes images available in patient records o Used by → Radiology Department: Primary system for radiologists o Requires → High Bandwidth Network: For transferring large image files
